item.title: Keep calm and discover Islam
item.author: Zara Hason,
item.description: There seems to be a ‘KEEP CALM….’ slogan for every situation including ‘KEEP CALM IT’S ONLY THE OLYMPICS’. But here’s one you may not have thought of, ‘KEEP CALM AND DISCOVER ISLAM’, perhaps because mainstream media has done such an effective job in portraying that word ‘Islam’ with …

item.title: Union Council votes for access to medicines paper
item.author: Zara Hason,
item.description: The motion ‘Imperial College Union Access to Medicines Policy’ was proposed to the Union Council on Tuesday by ICSMSU President Shiv Vohra and seconded by Kush Nake. The motion was passed. In brief, this motion was proposed in order for the Union to actively campaign to persuade Imperial College to …
